page.title: 19HOBBIES
page.content: On Thursday nights my brother Carl,a friend called Tim and I go to Mick Andrews' woods at Holloway with our trial bikes.Mick Andrews is a European trial bike champion.My bike is a Fantic 75 cc.When we get to Holloway, dad gets our bikes off the trailer.We put our gear on - leather boots with strong grips on the soles and helmets with ventilation.When we start,dad sets us a route over natural obstacles.If you put one foot down,one point is added to your score,two points for two feet and if you use your feet several times over an obstacle,it is three points.If you stop altogether with feet down it is five points and if your engine stalls or you fall off or touch a flag,it is five points.
